entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the one who raps on the door to enter Dumbledore's office. She tells Harry to wait and leaves him alone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who looks around Dumbledore's office and is scared that he will be thrown out of school.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's office is described as being very interesting and Harry wishes to look around it. It is also mentioned that the room belongs to Dumbledore.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: The Polyjuice Potion is not explicitly mentioned in this chapter but it is a part of Chapter Twelve and hence has been included

relationships.description: Harry looks around Dumbledore's office, indicating that he visited the office.
